1F122638B30C48A5AC331A4F3014EEC3.description: Explain ways that technology affects marketing communications.

5B1D54A1CB854F539C54A6E329C8B4A5.description: Identify trends in social media space.

54CC749BCE4E4DA4AEA75A6563858A12.description: Demonstrate techniques and strategies used to foster positive, ongoing relationships with customers.

35E13B2B1E9848269EFDF21D27F4D28A.description: Analyze the characteristics of entrepreneurs and small business managers.

C993D0D59497459EAB61AF793A2CEBCF.description: Critique advertisements to ensure achievement of marketing communications goals/objectives.

1FB0A20AB1AC4FDBB18E50EF75250515.description: Select target market appropriate for product/business to obtain the best return on marketing investment (ROMI).

1E04B758EE974552BACB64BD6DF3B4C7.description: Develop content for use in marketing communications to create interest in product/business/idea.

985EE56BC47740B48917809A83710573.description: Apply written and verbal skills to obtain/convey information and construct persuasive messages.

9F37F7A6E8644593B00BEACD5A8B4682.description: Marketing Cluster. These standards align to MBA Research and Curriculum Center http://www.mbaresearch.org/ and the National Business Education Association https://www.nbea.org/.

D39816EC67E940CDBDE0E4B55C52B045.description: Contribute constructively to project teams, assuming various roles and responsibilities to work effectively toward a common goal.

F6C601B129CA4C518614F26F07BBFF6B.description: Global Collaborator. Use digital tools to broaden perspectives and enrich learning by collaborating with others and working effectively in teams locally and globally.

6B2305BA453844CDBC3BD3ADC121C320.description: Publish or present content that customizes the message and medium for intended audiences.

1934434E6D5548AB865AD14E1B82A33C.description: Create original works or responsibly repurpose or remix digital resources into new creations.

8AED4EE631AB4551925002CE8ED1EEB3.description: Students choose the appropriate platforms and tools for meeting the desired objectives of their creation or communication.

D559FB1988BF44FEAE920D9A40230CC2.description: Creative Communicator. Students communicate clearly and express themselves creatively for a variety of purposes using platforms, tools, styles, formats, and digital media appropriate to their goals.

2D12A1AFF064470EB9BC7575E77E22DE.description: Collect data or identify relevant data sets, use digital tools to analyze them, and represent data in various ways to facilitate problem solving and decision-making.

4D75584EFC7B4AB6B4D2D25420563FEC.description: Computational Thinker. Develop and employ strategies for understanding and solving problems in ways that leverage the power of technological methods to develop and test solutions.

59A806F6154C4A399F8443FCFB7A10BE.description: Select and use digital tools to plan and manage a design process that considers design constraints and calculated risks.

EFE348AC7FF2456693E72318084A711C.description: Know and use a deliberate design process for generating ideas, testing theories, creating innovative artifacts, or solving authentic problems.

10AFBD7DCB394C01B7CDD3025007B2BE.description: Innovative Designer. Use a variety of technologies within a design process to identify and solve problems by creating new, useful, or imaginative solutions.

FF5F2420E04349138C51B901C4BB6838.description: Evaluate the accuracy, perspective, credibility and relevance of information, media, data, or other resources.

6AD6076169AE494CA7F7D2DAF9268117.description: Plan and employ effective research strategies to locate information and other resources for intellectual or creative pursuits.

ED68E2282578463181369E09785624BC.description: Knowledge Constructor. Students critically curate a variety of resources using digital tools to construct knowledge, produce creative artifacts and make meaningful learning experiences for themselves and others.

8666FF19B8B04294A9C2B425AA6270FA.description: Engage in positive, safe, legal, and ethical behavior when using technology, including social interactions online or when using networked devices.

BBAADAB2D73B4912BE217AA2CED96084.description: Students cultivate and manage their digital identity and reputation and are aware of the permanence of their actions in the digital world.

AB872133CDA34806ABC94AF346105FC2.description: Digital Citizen. Recognize the rights, responsibilities, and opportunities of living, learning, and working in an interconnected digital world, and they act and model in ways that are safe, legal, and ethical.

E04C84FE147D4EC3B731445924E37CF9.description: Students use technology to seek feedback that informs and improves their practice and to demonstrate their learning in a variety of ways.

D760FE2C0EBD40199166A45EF82E1076.description: Students build networks and customize their learning environments in ways that support the learning process.

D559E7F0616B46A6B1D05C388C9F547D.description: Articulate and set personal learning goals, develop strategies leveraging technology to achieve them and reflect on the learning process itself to improve learning outcomes.

C25D4E0CAFF5426C953B24FC80340EA5.description: Empowered Learner. Leverage technology to take an active role in choosing, achieving, and demonstrating competency in their learning goals, informed by the learning sciences.

256325455D554FBCA7C1F0EB879D71C7.description: Information Technology Cluster. ISTE Standards for Students ©2016, ISTE® (International Society for Technology in Education), iste.org. All rights reserved. http://www.iste.org/standards/standards/for-students-2016

4DBC003A2A8447EEB97BD56CD06BA961.description: Develop and apply banking account management skills.

A569ADE2923A44BB8F3B4520B8D75166.description: Demonstrate the ability to balance a checkbook and reconcile financial accounts.

AFA6821D067D44B493BF62E5B89DC51E.description: Describe and compare the most common financial products and services.

1A5EC9943F9145D58DB1444CB1AAE23B.description: Identify and compare the basic types of financial institutions.

E10458200BAB4C1FA28AEA035BC8E164.description: Describe the functions and uses of banks and other financial service providers.

698573E2C9EB4062A6AECFF5B0D1CF46.description: Explain the importance of meeting tax obligations and describe consequences of failing to meet those obligations.

C83C4BA462774AB7AD20B378F0AA19E6.description: Identify and explain types of taxes and explain the reasons for taxation at the local, state, and federal levels.

F2B0B1E2345449B4B504441C55C7D9DE.description: Identify and describe the impact of local, state, and federal taxes upon income and standard of living.

AE2E4DCFC797420E8F393D64E7B88E6A.description: Explain how taxes, employee benefits, and payroll deductions affect income.

3C7AFF168FBA448B94EB844DDAC882D5.description: Identify the components of a personal/family budget based on short, medium, and long-term goals.

EA464C1D81CC4E59ABFF0FC2408EC42F.description: Evaluate how career choices, educational/vocational preparation, skills, and entrepreneurship affect income and standard of living.

867874AF488D45E6B2300CD62BB30A17.description: Describe the importance of earning an income and explain how to manage personal income using a budget.

2B5C89EBA7DD4A569AC7ED6CFB9ADB63.description: Finance Cluster. These standards are taken from the Oklahoma Priority Academic Student Skills (PASS) for Personal Financial Literacy as designated in the Passport to Financial Literacy Act of 2007 (O.S. §11-103.6h). http://sde.ok.gov/sde/sites/ok.gov.sde/files/PASS_Personal_Financial_Literacy_rev08-2015.pdf

48603AB5EEB24F16AFF73B7BC246DBF1.description: Apply information about time zones, seasons, and domestic and international maps to create or enhance travel.

6A7A5834BE1B4AC2BF197DD3D1E8B19A.description: Identify and compare services and products from related industries to understand how they affect hospitality and tourism products and services.

9AC48E16C58940709819B3E0FFC1079D.description: Integrate the principles of customer service to positively impact organizational performance.

71A7CAD02DF2485BB69C7BA9887DD0EA.description: Use customer comments to guide customer satisfaction policies.

52F136890B3A4DBEA4AD119D6924EF4C.description: Trace the development of the hospitality and tourism industry to understand the overall structure.

03D3021A827D439C8A36DDBF8A491B8A.description: Identify management styles within a variety of organizational structures.

7D882289402A4469A10C4006E13BF5E0.description: Evaluate the nature, scope, and role of hospitality and tourism in society and the economy.

335EF22ABB384B55A3C7215A35E55666.description: Identify safety hazards and ergonomic risks within the workplace/computer labs.

12D94E97485049838D98DE6F17ECE6DD.description: Safety. Understand health and safety policies, procedures, regulations, and practices, including the use of equipment, handling of hazardous materials, and use of the Internet.

7ACCC8BDE87D4AE08C88633C460EB3AC.description: Model work-readiness traits required for success in the workplace.

A5A6B2201F9141D6B83834521497BC75.description: Understand the role and function of professional organizations, industry associations, and organized labor in a productive society.

1C9F34C81C9A4256AE1BA99783A09BF0.description: Career Exploration. Examine educational requirements, job responsibilities, employment trends, and opportunities within different career pathways.

0F29B2ABEA884D13A05B8AB8B4F9111F.description: Demonstrate effective verbal, non-verbal, written, and digital communication skills as they apply to the workplace.

267C75EB600E423692C18FB8F97BF350.description: Participate in a wide range of idea creation techniques (such as brainstorming) while demonstrating originality and inventiveness in work and an understanding of the real-world limits to adopting new ideas.

BAE24290BDD748D3996B9333491D8A55.description: 21st Century Skills. Develop an understanding of the 4C’s of the 21st century skills as they relate to the business world: creativity, communication, critical thinking, and collaboration.

AB6C54F601DA45C9A64A07E5491FD479.description: Keyboarding. Demonstrate keyboarding skills utilizing current technology.
